definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to celebrate a birthday/to give a birthday party

sentences.english: And a piranha 's a fish, just like your present.
sentences.chinese: 食人魚也是一種魚，就像你的生日禮物一樣。

sentences.english: He was abashed at forgetting his wife's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他因忘了妻子的生日而感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Folded in the card was a piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 只見生日卡里夾着一張摺疊起來的紙。

sentences.english: The twenty-seventh is my birthday, I plan to put up a marquee and throw a party .
sentences.chinese: 二十七是我的生日，我還要搭個棚呢，請請客。

sentences.english: I'm having so much fun with it!
sentences.chinese: 對我而言，在生日時收到祝語最有意義。

sentences.english: This Saturday is my birthday and I'm goingto hold a party in my house.
sentences.chinese: 這個星期六是我的生日，我要在我家舉辦一個聚會。

sentences.english: You just type a few keys, “Happy birthday,” and you send that, and then you’re okay.
sentences.chinese: 只需要寫“生日快樂”，然後發出去就可以了。

sentences.english: A book was given to her as a birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 她哥哥送給她一本書作爲生日禮品。

sentences.english: Leons birthday is coming soon, hao beauty attentively to prepare gifts for Leon.
sentences.chinese: 李昂生日快到了，郝麗人用心準備給李昂的禮物。

sentences.english: Shou was bestowed by Empress Dowager Cixi when she presented the Empress with the embroidered tapestry, Eight Immortals Celebrating Birthday.
sentences.chinese: 壽被賦予慈溪太后她皇后繡掛毯，八老慶祝生日。

sentences.english: The two friends gave presents to each other on their birthdays.
sentences.chinese: 兩個朋友在生日時互贈禮物。

sentences.english: They celebrate his birthday with a dance party.
sentences.chinese: 他們舉辦一個舞會來慶祝他的生日。

sentences.english: I received an invitation to her birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了她生日宴會的請貼。

sentences.english: Also noisemakers are thought to be used at parties as a way of scaring away the evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在生日會上發出的歡呼聲能夠嚇跑邪惡的幽靈。

sentences.english: The long-haired OA-Puss will celebrate her 24th birthday in January — much to the  astonishment of Quentin Shaw, who has owned her since 1987.
sentences.chinese: 這隻長毛貓貓，即將在一月份迎來自己的24歲生日。

definition: child whose birthday is being celebrated/birthday boy/birthday girl

Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting
